document_api_meta.title: Search Target Collaborations
document_api_meta.env_desc: This API is used by Seller to search for all existing target collaborations. Sellers can search based on filters such as Invitation name, Invitation ID, Product name, Product ID and Creator name.

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The seller access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 0. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a344ddec3030b238fa0) to get seller access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: page_size
request_query_param.desc: The value of "page_size" must be 20, 50 or 100.

request_query_param.name: page_token
request_query_param.desc: Pagination offset determines where you begin to search for. It's empty when raise your first request.

request_query_param.name: shop_cipher
request_query_param.desc:
Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response. 
Get by API [Get Authorization Shop](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9?external_id=6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9)

request_body_param.name: creator_accept_status
request_body_param.desc:
Filtering by acceptance status of creators who are invited to target collaborations.
You can query based on:
- "ACCEPT", it means creators have already added the products to the showcase
- "ALL""", it means regardless of whether the creator adds the product to the Showcase.
By default, the target collaborations will be searched by "ALL" status.

request_body_param.name: free_sample_setting
request_body_param.desc:
Filtering by target collaborations' free sample setting.
You can query based on:
- "WITH_FREE_SAMPLE"
- "ALL"
By default, the target collaborations will be searched by "ALL" setting.

request_body_param.name: ^keyword_type
request_body_param.desc:
Pass in the parameter type which you use to search for target collaborations. 
You can query based on:
- PRODUCT_ID：If you use PRODUCT_ID  to search, you can search for target collaboration information for a specified product ID.
- PRODUCT_NAME: If you use PRODUCT_NAME to search, you can fuzzy search for target collaboration information involving related product names.
- TARGET_COLLABORATION_ID: if you use Target_Collaboration_ID to search, you can search for target collaboration information for a specified target collaboration ID.
- TARGET_COLLABORATION_NAME: If you use Target_Collaboration_NAME to search, you can fuzzy search for target collaboration information involving related target collaboration names.

request_body_param.name: creator_user_open_id
request_body_param.desc:
Creators' TikTok User Open ID.[More details](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/3obfokj6)

- CREATOR_OPEN_ID: If you use CREATOR_OPEN_ID  to search, you can search for target collaboration information for a specified creator ID.

request_body_param.name: collaboration_status
request_body_param.desc:
Filtering by target collaborations' status.
You can query based on:
- ONGOING: If you use ONGOING to search, the remaining validity period of the returned target collaborations will be greater than 7 days.
- EXPIRING: If you use EXPIRING to search, the remaining validity period of the returned target collaborations will be less than 7 days.
- VALID: If you use VALID to search, all returned target collaborations will be valid.
- CANCELING: If you use CANCELING to search, all returned target collaborations will be in the process of canceling.
- COMPLETED: If you use COMPLETED to search, all returned target collaborations will be in the state of completed, including expired and canceled.

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: request_id
response_param.desc: Request log

response_param.name: data
response_param.desc: Specific return information

response_param.name: ^total_count
response_param.desc: The total count of target collaboration returned by this query.

response_param.name: ^next_page_token
response_param.desc: Cursor for the next page request.

response_param.name: ^target_collaborations
response_param.desc: The basic information of target collaboration which creators can view in Targeted Invitation on TikTok EC Center.

response_param.name: ^^id
response_param.desc: Target collaboration ID.

response_param.name: ^^name
response_param.desc: Target collaboration name.

response_param.name: ^^message
response_param.desc: Message seller has sent to creators about seller's  introduction and why excited to collaborate.

response_param.name: ^^start_time
response_param.desc: The start time of the target collaboration.

response_param.name: ^^end_time
response_param.desc: The end time of the target collaboration.

response_param.name: ^^update_time
response_param.desc: The update time of the target collaboration.

response_param.name: ^^creator_inivited_count
response_param.desc: The count of creators invited in the target collaboration.

response_param.name: ^^showcase_creator_count
response_param.desc: This field indicates the number of creators who added the product to the showcase from target collaboration.

response_param.name: ^^content_creator_count
response_param.desc: The number of creators who posted content featuring products from target collaboration.

response_param.name: ^^product_count
response_param.desc: The count of products added in the target collaboration.

response_param.name: ^^free_sample_rule
response_param.desc: The free sample rules set by the seller in the target collaboration.

response_param.name: ^^^has_free_sample
response_param.desc: If true, free samples are provided to creators invited to the target collaboration.

response_param.name: ^^^is_sample_approval_exempt
response_param.desc:
If true, creators invited to the target collaboration are exempt from seller review and will automatically be approved for a free sample.
Note that if has_free_sample=false, this field will not take effect.

response_param.name: ^^type
response_param.desc:
The type of target collaboration.
Field values:
- STANDARD: The target collaboration is created by sellers manually selecting products and creators.
- TOP_CREATOR_PROGRAM: The target collaboration created by seller joining TikTok Shop Top Creator Program, requiring only product submission.

sample_code.label: Go
sample_code.value:
// For more details about the SDK, refer to the documentation:
// https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/67c83e0799a75104986ae498
func affiliateSeller202508SearchTargetCollaborationsPost() {
    configuration := apis.NewConfiguration()
    configuration.AddAppInfo(appKey, appSecret)
    apiClient := apis.NewAPIClient(configuration)
    request := apiClient.AffiliateSellerV202508API.AffiliateSeller202508TargetCollaborationsSearchPost(context.Background())
    request = request.XTtsAccessToken("your access token")
    request = request.ContentType("application/json")
    request = request.PageSize(20)
    request = request.PageToken("b2Zmc2V0PTAK")
    request = request.ShopCipher("your shop cipher")
    affiliateSeller202508SearchTargetCollaborationsRequestBody := affiliateSeller_v202508.NewAffiliateSeller202508SearchTargetCollaborationsRequestBody()
    affiliateSeller202508SearchTargetCollaborationsRequestBody.SetCreatorAcceptStatus("ACCEPT")
    affiliateSeller202508SearchTargetCollaborationsRequestBody.SetFreeSampleSetting("WITH_FREE_SAMPLE")
    affiliateSeller202508SearchTargetCollaborationsRequestBodySearchParam := affiliateSeller_v202508.NewAffiliateSeller202508SearchTargetCollaborationsRequestBodySearchParam()
    affiliateSeller202508SearchTargetCollaborationsRequestBodySearchParam.SetKeywordType("TARGET_COLLABORATION_NAME")
    affiliateSeller202508SearchTargetCollaborationsRequestBodySearchParam.SetKeyword("test")
    affiliateSeller202508SearchTargetCollaborationsRequestBody.SetSearchParam(*affiliateSeller202508SearchTargetCollaborationsRequestBodySearchParam)
    affiliateSeller202508SearchTargetCollaborationsRequestBody.SetCreatorUserOpenId("uACafQAAAABmUU2qon4R0vUYvUVS3QC6CICP2m5A2-wd77j8R9G0yg")
    affiliateSeller202508SearchTargetCollaborationsRequestBody.SetCollaborationStatus("ONGOING")
    request = request.AffiliateSeller202508SearchTargetCollaborationsRequestBody(*affiliateSeller202508SearchTargetCollaborationsRequestBody)
    resp, httpResp, err := request.Execute()
    if err != nil || httpResp.StatusCode != 200 {
        fmt.Printf("productsRequest err:%v resbody:%s", err, httpResp.Body)
        return
    }
    if resp == nil {
        fmt.Printf("response is nil")
        return
    }
    if resp.GetCode()!= 0 {
        fmt.Printf("response business is error, errorCode:%d errorMessage:%s", resp.GetCode(), resp.GetMessage())
        return
    }
    respDataJson, _ := json.MarshalIndent(resp.GetData(), "", "  ")
    fmt.Println("response data:", string(respDataJson))
    return
}

sample_code.label: Node.js
Java

scope_list.package_description: The application will be able to access a Seller's overall TikTok Shop Affiliate Collaborations, including but not limited to collaboration details (e.g., activity, applications, descriptions, and performance), creator participation/engagement results, affiliate links, affiliate orders, and sample rules.
scope_list.auth_info: The application will be able to access your TikTok Shop Affiliate Collaborations, including but not limited to collaboration activity and performance, creator participation/engagement results, affiliate links, and affiliate orders.
